TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CLSCompliantAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CLSCompliantAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CLSCompliantAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示程式項目是否符合 Common Language Specification (CLS) 標準。

span.span: Indicates whether a program element is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來表示特定程式項目是否符合與 Common Language Specification (CLS)，其定義的任何.NET Framework 為目標的語言都必須支援的功能。The attribute is used to indicate whether a particular program element complies with the Common Language Specification (CLS), which defines the features that any language that targets the .NET Framework must support. CLS 合規性是考量的主要的程式庫的開發人員想要確保他們的程式庫可以存取.NET Framework 為目標的任何語言。CLS compliance is primarily of concern to library developers who want to ensure that their libraries are accessible in any language that targets the .NET Framework. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Language Independence and Language-independent Components](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md)。For more information, See [Language Independence and Language-Independent Components](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md). 您可以套用到下列的程式項目屬性： 組件、 模組、 類別、 結構、 列舉、 建構函式、 方法、 屬性、 欄位、 事件、 介面、 委派、 參數和傳回值。You can apply the attribute to the following program elements: assembly, module, class, struct, enum, constructor, method, property, field, event, interface, delegate, parameter, and return value. 不過，CLS 合規性的概念才有意義的組件、 模組、 類型和成員的型別，不含成員簽章的組件。However, the notion of CLS compliance is only meaningful for assemblies, modules, types, and members of types, not parts of a member signature. 因此，時套用至參數或傳回值的程式項目，會忽略。Consequently, is ignored when applied to parameter or return value program elements. 如果沒有程式項目，則預設會套用：If no is applied to a program element, then by default: - 組件不符合 CLS 標準。The assembly is not CLS-compliant. - 只有當其封入型別或組件是符合 CLS 標準，此類型為符合 CLS 標準。The type is CLS-compliant only if its enclosing type or assembly is CLS-compliant. - 型別的成員，才符合 CLS 規範的型別是符合 CLS 標準。The member of a type is CLS-compliant only if the type is CLS-compliant. 如果組件標示為符合 CLS 標準，必須以標記不符合 CLS 標準的組件中任何公開型別使用`false`引數。If an assembly is marked as CLS-compliant, any publicly exposed type in the assembly that is not CLS-compliant must be marked with using a `false` argument. 同樣地，如果類別標示為符合 CLS 規範，您必須個別標記不符合 CLS 標準的所有成員。Similarly, if a class is marked as CLS-compliant, you must individually mark all members that are not CLS-compliant. 所有不符合規範的成員必須提供對應的符合 CLS 規範替代方案。All non-compliant members must provide corresponding CLS-compliant alternatives. 會套用至組件或模組的屬性必須發生在 C# 之後`using`(`Imports` Visual Basic 中) 子句與程式碼之前。Attributes that are applied to assemblies or modules must occur after the C# `using` (`Imports` in Visual Basic) clauses and before the code. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 目前的 Microsoft Visual Basic 編譯器刻意不會產生 cls 符合性警告，不過，未來版本的編譯器會發出警告。The current Microsoft Visual Basic compiler intentionally does not generate a CLS-compliance warning, however, a future release of the compiler will issue that warning. ## Examples 下列範例會套用整個組件。The following example applies a to the entire assembly. ```csharp using System; [assembly: CLSCompliant(true)] ``` 下列宣告會產生 cls 符合性警告，因為類型`UInt32`CLS 中未指定。The following declaration generates a CLS-compliance warning because the type `UInt32` is not specified in the CLS. ```csharp public int SetValue(UInt32 value); ``` 如果宣告以標記，會產生任何編譯器警告或錯誤。If the declaration is marked with a , no compiler warning or error is generated. ```csharp [CLSCompliant(false)] public int SetValue(UInt32 value); ```

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with a Boolean value indicating whether the indicated program element is CLS-compliant.
